attributes.action: We would like Captain Tom Moore to receive a special honour or knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has to date raised £2m for the NHS, smashing his original £1000 target. At 99 years of age he is an inspiration to not just the nation but the world at such a terrible time.
attributes.background: We would like Captain Tom Moore yo receive recognition for his incredible fundraising.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
